chemoreception.notes: Nematodes generally rely on chemoreception for various functions, including food detection and mate recognition. Inferred presence due to widespread reliance on chemoreception in nematodes.

mechanoreception.notes: Nematodes generally rely on mechanoreception for sensing their environment and movement. Inferred presence due to widespread reliance on mechanoreception in nematodes.

vision.notes: The presence or absence of vision in Meyliidae is not mentioned in the provided context.
